column3: I'm not sure that the `GetMetadata` change is really the right direction. What I was thinking was more of passing in the scriptPubKey directly (or maybe a CTxDestination?) and pulling from it the key id or script id via the Solver.\n\nEverything else looks good.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.
